WorkItem.ClosedComment: We've not been able to reproduce this, but made some changes which should have fixed this in the next release.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

Randomly when I'm trying to close a typescript file, I get a popup in VS saying that an extension caused an exception and that I should look in the logs. When opening the Activity xml file, I see the following:

631 ERROR System.NotImplementedException: The method or operation is not implemented. at System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ThrowExceptionForHRInternal(Int32 errorCode, IntPtr errorInfo) at TypeScriptLanguageService.ScriptContext.KnownBuffersCollection.GetTextLines(Object docData) at TypeScriptLanguageService.ScriptContext.KnownBuffersCollection.CollectBuffersFromRunningDocumentTable() at TypeScriptLanguageService.ScriptContext.KnownBuffersCollection.get_Buffers() at TypeScriptLanguageService.ScriptContext.DefaultScriptContextProvider.RefreshOpenDocumentList(Action callback, Nullable`1 delay, Boolean scriptConfigurationChanged) at TypeScriptLanguageService.ScriptContext.DefaultScriptContextProvider.OnTextViewClosed(ITextView textView) at TypeScriptLanguageService.ScriptContext.VsTextViewCreationListener.<>c__DisplayClass2.<VsTextViewCreated>b__1(Object sender, EventArgs e) at Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.Utilities.GuardedOperations.RaiseEvent(Object sender, EventHandler eventHandlers)   Editor or Editor Extension 2013/09/20 15:08:19.329 

Thanks,
Sebastien.
WorkItem.Summary: Crash in VS 2012 when closing Typescript file

Comments.Message:
Typescript 0.9.1.1
ASP.NET MVC 4

I don't really have a repro. I hope you can make something out of the logs I sent...

Thanks for reporting, we need a little more info.

Which version of typescript are you using? 
Are you in a project context or just a .ts file? What kind of project (ASP.NET, Console App etc?)

Do you have a repro?

If you have more info, can you re-open the bug using the re-open on top.


** Closed by paulb 09/20/2013 11:51AM
I have Web essentials 2.4.5 with everything disabled. I use web essential only to be able to drag a file from the solution explorer into a typescript file to add easily references.

Please re-open with which extensions (and which version of them) you have installed. Is there a Web Essentials extension or something else TypeScript related installed?

** Closed by danquirk 10/02/2013 3:24PM
Thanks for updating we're taking a look.
